sql-descriptor.sql: WITH T1 ( PKMS_CORP_CODE ,PKMS_COME_CODE ,PKMS_TABL_ID ,PKMS_SORT_NUMB ,PKMS_TABL_NAME ,PKMS_UPDT_DATE ,PKMS_UPDT_CMAN ,PKMS_INIT_DATE ,PKMS_INIT_CMAN ) AS ( SELECT 'K1', 'C', 'ESACDDT' , 1, null, '20240430', 'SYSTEMPG', '20240430', 'SYSTEMPG' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 'K1', 'C', 'ESACDDL' , 2, null, '20240430', 'SYSTEMPG', '20240430', 'SYSTEMPG' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 'K1', 'D', 'ESFRSLN' , 3, null, '20240430', 'SYSTEMPG', '20240430', 'SYSTEMPG' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 'K1', 'D', 'ESAUSER' , 4, null, '20240501', 'SYSTEMPG', '20240501', 'SYSTEMPG' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 'K1', 'C', 'ESAPCOG' , 5, null, '20240502', 'SYSTEMPG', '20240502', 'SYSTEMPG' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 'K1', 'C', 'ESAJOBM' , 6, null, '20240502', 'SYSTEMPG', '20240502', 'SYSTEMPG' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 'K1', 'C', 'ESAJOBU' , 7, null, '20240502', 'SYSTEMPG', '20240502', 'SYSTEMPG' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 'K1', 'C', 'ESAOGMG' , 8, null, '20240502', 'SYSTEMPG', '20240502', 'SYSTEMPG' FROM DUAL 'SYSTEMPG' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 'K1', 'C', 'ESAAUMU' , 15, null, '20240502', 'SYSTEMPG', '20240502', 'SYSTEMPG' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 'K1', 'C', 'ESAAUFU' , 16, null, '20240502', 'SYSTEMPG', 58, null, '20240503', 'SYSTEMPG', '20240503', 'SYSTEMPG' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 'K1', 'C', 'CXTBDLOG' , 59, null, '20240505', 'SYSTEMPG', '20240505', 'SYSTEMPG' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 'K1', 'I', 'CITBCORT' , 60, null, '20240507', 'SYSTEMPG', '20240507', 'SYSTEMPG' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 'K1', 'I', 'CITBMCIF' , 61, null, '20240507', 'SYSTEMPG', '20240506', 'SYSTEMPG' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 'K1', 'I', 'CITBMATL' , 62, null, '20240507', 'SYSTEMPG', '20240507', 'SYSTEMPG' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 'K1', 'C', 'CATBMCHI' , 63, null, '20240506', 'SYSTEMPG', '20240506', 'SYSTEMPG' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 'K1', 'C', 'CRTBCMCT' , 64, null, '20240506', 'SYSTEMPG', '20240506', 'SYSTEMPG' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 'K1', 'C', 'CRTBMSUM' , 65, null, '20240506', 'SYSTEMPG', '20240506', 'SYSTEMPG' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 'K1', 'C', 'CRTBCETC' , 66, null, '20240507', 'SYSTEMPG', '20240507', 'SYSTEMPG' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 'K1', 'C', 'CRTBCMAC' , 67, null, '20240510', 'SYSTEMPG', '20240510', 'SYSTEMPG' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 'K1', 'I', 'CITBLOTQ' , 68, null, '20240510', 'SYSTEMPG', '20240510', 'SYSTEMPG' FROM DUAL ) SELECT CASE WHEN B.TABLE_NAME IS NOT NULL THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END CREATED_YN ,D.CREATED ,A.* FROM T1 A LEFT OUTER JOIN USER_TABLES B ON B.TABLE_NAME = A.PKMS_TABL_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN USER_TAB_COMMENTS C ON C.TABLE_NAME = A.PKMS_TABL_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN USER_OBJECTS D ON D.OBJECT_NAME = B.TABLE_NAME ORDER BY A.PKMS_SORT_NUMB

WITH T1 ( C1 ,C2 ) AS ( SELECT 1, 'ORG_INFO' FROM DUAL ) SELECT CASE WHEN B.OBJECT_NAME IS NULL THEN 'N' ELSE 'Y' END CREATED_YN ,B.STATUS ,A.* FROM T1 A LEFT OUTER JOIN USER_OBJECTS B ON B.OBJECT_NAME = A.C2

WITH T1 ( C1 ,C2 ) AS ( SELECT 1, 'FC_GET_OG_INFO' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 2, 'FC_COMP_CUR' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 3, 'FC_GET_NAME' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 4, 'SVC_MAPPING' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 5, 'CRFT_IMST_PART_NAME' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 6, 'CRFT_USER_TEAM_CODE' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 7, 'CRFT_USER_EMPL_NAME' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 8, 'CRSPEMST_I05' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 9, 'CRFT_MAX0_SEQ0_INTR' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 10, 'CRFT_MAX0_SEQ0_EXTR' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 11, 'CRFT_SPMS_VEND_NAME' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 12, 'CRFT_EMRO_VEND_NAME' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 13, 'CRSPCOMM_Q01' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 14, 'SEQ_DLOG' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 15, 'CRSPCORT_Q01' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 16, 'CRSPSUM0_D01' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 17, 'CASPMCHH_Q02' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 18, 'CRSPCPRO_C01' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 19, 'CRSPCAPL_I01' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 20, 'CRSPCMAT_C01' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 21, 'CRSPREAL_C01' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 22, 'CRSPCOMM_S02' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 23, 'CRSPETC0_C01' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 24, 'CRSPSPCR_C01' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 25, 'CLFT_GET_CURR_SCRP' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 25, 'CLFT_GET_CURR_MATL' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 26, 'CASPBRAZ_P18_5' FROM DUAL ) SELECT CASE WHEN B.OBJECT_NAME IS NULL THEN 'N' ELSE 'Y' END CREATED_YN ,B.STATUS ,A.* FROM T1 A LEFT OUTER JOIN USER_OBJECTS B ON B.OBJECT_NAME = A.C2 ORDER BY A.C1
SELECT B.TEXT TEXT_SRC ,A.* FROM USER_ERRORS A LEFT OUTER JOIN USER_SOURCE B ON B.NAME = A.NAME AND B.TYPE = A.TYPE AND B.LINE = A.LINE WHERE A.NAME = #c2# ORDER BY A.SEQUENCE
